Website section: Add the "page-name_variation-name" in a row to show a specification for that variation in the Design System.
Specification: Name of the specification in a specs table.
Variable: Name of the web variable in a specs table.
Value: Name of the web value in a specs table.
Pixels: Enter any units (in E-M) that you want to appear in the specs table for a variation.
